title: Shooting at Arkansas Car Show Leaves One Dead, 28 Wounded
sub_head: One suspect in custody after gunfire swept the crowd during annual community event in Dumas, Ark.
body:
A shooting at a car show in southeast Arkansas on Saturday left one person dead and 28 wounded, including multiple children, state police said.
A man was detained while trying to leave the scene of the shooting, Arkansas State Police Col. Bill Bryant said at a Sunday afternoon press conference.
